response.overview: In a charming guest house, Sonia and Sameer find themselves thrust into an unexpected situation, forced to play the roles of a married couple. As they face challenges and spend time together, their initial animosity gives way to a deeper connection. However, doubts and external influences threaten to tear them apart, making them question the authenticity of their feelings. Amidst the chaos, they must confront their fears and trust in the power of love to find their way back to each other. Destiny's intricate dance unfolds, revealing whether their shared experiences will bring them together for real or leave them forever longing for what could have been
response.title: Heer Majno
